name: Sakura Miko
collabEffect: Collab Effect 誰かの芽吹きになれたら: You can roll a die once: If it lands on 1, 3, or 5, reveal one  red or blue cheer card from your cheer deck and send it to your back Holomen. Then shuffle your cheer deck
source: Sakura Miko first album 'flower rhapsody' limited edition

name: ReGLOSS
ability: This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, excluding this card. Look at the top four cards of your Deck. Reveal any number of them that are holomems with #ReGLOSS and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

name: パヴォリア・レイネ

oshiSkill.name: グリーンエンハンス  ("Green Enhance")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] One of your Green holomems' Arts gains +20 power until the end of this turn..

spOshiSkill.name: Birthday Gift ～Green～
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Reveal 1 Green holomem from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

source: Pavolia Reine 2024 birthday merch full set bonus
